message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?

I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $135, which is the lowest I'm comfortable with. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125?

I'm still not willing to go below $130, but I'm willing to make a small concession. I can do $129, which is the absolute lowest I'm comfortable with. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125 again?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $128, which is my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand that you're willing to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable going above $125. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I've already made a significant concession, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $128 and $125, which is $126.50. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're unwilling to go any lower, but I'm still not comfortable with $126.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $125 and $126.50, which is $125.75. This is my final offer.
